reviews.review_msg: Great lecturer - very engaging even when topics can be pretty dense. She speaks really quietly. Very approachable. Choose presentation topics wisely! You need to dissect, analyze, and present two papers thoroughly -  this takes more time/effort than you think.

Dr. Brumme's course is very interesting. Her passion for the subject is very evident and inspiring. Exams are very thorough, though extremely fair, make sure you know all your content. If you want to learn, you will like this course and Dr. Brumme. Two paper presentations, choose your paper wisely and read it well!

2 group presentations, not easy on the marking. She expects you to have the 'fourth year' mind set already, that means read every one of the articles or REGRET.  If you suck at presentations, prepare to get slammed by the prof and classmates.
